Text: Drinks this evening Eddie Reitz Cc tonight Houstons Westheimer at Willcrest just outside beltway Some of you have asked questions about his background heres what I have approached by us has met John Lavorato who liked him a lot met Scott Neal for drinks last week Scott liked him top gas trader at Duke was offerred a position with Enron about years ago but declined Sell Enron and determine his suitablility Let me know how it goes Thanks Neil

FW eddie rietzefyi Ill call him this afternoonevening and get his feedback and work with Kim on getting him in to close this down Whalley has asked to meet him when he comes in Do you want to see him again Neil Original Message From Neal Scott Sent Thursday May PM To Davies Neil Subject eddie rietze I had a great visit with Eddie Rietze last night We spent about hours together I think we should definately pursue him He is interested talking further We will probably need to meet with him during the evening Please let me know if I need to do anything to proceed I indicated to Eddie that you would be contacting him to set an interview schedule thanks Scott

PPA Pitch to DynergyAs per our earlier conversation Ive attached a copy of our PPA pitch to Dynergy I hope this is helpful if you or Greg Whalley meets with XXXX from Dynergy Derek Forwarded by Derek DaviesCALECT on AM Jason Biever AM To Derek CT cc Subject lavos presentation

Ive been approached by a couple of loads in Montana totalling MWs Zufferli and I did some rough math on the costs of transmission and what our implied offer would be and havent heard back from the counterparties I think that you need more critical mass to make a project work Derek Forwarded by Derek DaviesCALECT on AM From John J nronXgate on PM CDT To Derek CT cc Subject Derek Fed Ex the PPA sales pitch to me Also I read in the newspaper that Montana was tight for power I couldnt tell wether they are tight or the price is just high Can we sell long term power to a counterparty or two or three in Montana and build a line John
give him a call Derek Forwarded by Derek DaviesCALECT on AM From John J nronXgate on PM CDT To Derek CT cc Subject I told Miller that you and him should sit down and discuss the PPA
